name: lstat
purpose: Gives information about a file or symbolic link

return.description:
See the manual page for stat for information on
   the structure of the array that lstat returns.
   This function is identical to the stat function
   except that if the filename parameter is a symbolic
   link, the status of the symbolic link is returned, not the status of the
   file pointed to by the symbolic link.

notes.description:
The results of this
function are cached. See clearstatcache for
more details.

As of PHP 5.0.0, this function
can also be used with some URL wrappers.  Refer to
 for a listing of which wrappers support
stat family of functionality.
